body:
Both, this method as well as `tech_interest_list` serve one a single purpose: formatting an array for being able to show it in a view. Given the size of the user model 😉  it would probably be cool to keep view-related code out there ✌️ 

Can you think of a better place for this? Maybe have something like this in a `UsersHelper` view helper module:
```ruby
def render_tag_list(tags)
  tags.join(", ")
end

# and call it like this:
render_tag_list(user.tech_expertise)
```

What do you think?
